topics.title: Control System Flexibility
topics.description: The speaker highlights that LQR control allows users to choose how their system behaves, based on performance weights and effort.
evidence_quotes: So it's up to you how you want your system to behave in the end

topics.title: Cost Function
topics.description: Setting up a cost function for LQR control system
evidence_quotes: [00:05:44.060 → 00:05:48.060] We set up a cost function that adds up the weighted sum of performance and effort over all time.
[00:07:02.180 → 00:07:08.660] This has the effect of punishing larger errors disproportionately more than smaller ones.

topics.title: LQR Control Power
topics.description: The speaker emphasizes the simplicity and intuitiveness of LQR control, which returns an optimal gain matrix based on performance weights.
evidence_quotes: it's simple to set up and relatively intuitive to tune and tweak

topics.title: LQR Control System
topics.description: Designing a control system using LQR approaches
evidence_quotes: [00:05:16.820 → 00:05:21.480] And this is exactly the same kind of reasoning we do when designing a control system.
[00:04:56.000 → 00:05:02.560] Rather than think about pole locations, we can think about and assess what is important...

topics.title: Pole Placement Challenge
topics.description: The speaker explains that pole placement would require knowing how to move closed-loop poles, which can be tough. This highlights the complexity of pole placement.
evidence_quotes: we would have had to know how to move these poles just like this
